values: The Spell That Opened Heaven: Funeral Message for Daniel Fuller (1925–2023)The Spell That Opened Heaven: Funeral Message for Daniel Fuller (1925–2023)

Romans 8:32 is perhaps the greatest verse in the Bible. No other text quite describes how far God has gone for our salvation and will go for our joy.Romans 8:32 is perhaps the greatest verse in the Bible. No other text quite describes how far God has gone for our salvation and will go for our joy.
